Quite an excess of languages here. You get both Japanese and English audio, plus six included softsubs. Two English (Official DVD subtitles matching the english audio, or a more faithful fan translation), two Chinese (Traditional and Simplified) plus Italian and Spanish.

DVDrip. Not HD. Quality looks very good though.
